job_application.title: Job Application
job_application.purpose: Apply for a job formally, highlight suitability, and request an interview or next steps.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: State why you are writing and where you found the opportunity.
expressions: Dear [Hiring Manager's Name],
I am writing to apply for the position of [Job Title] advertised on [Website/Platform] on [Date].
Please accept this email as my formal application for the role of [Job Title] at [Company Name].
I would like to express my interest in the vacancy for [Job Title], as advertised by [Company Name].

sections.title: Experience & Evidence
sections.purpose: Present relevant skills, experience, and achievements with clear examples.
expressions: I believe I am well suited to this role due to my experience in [Field/Area] and my ability to [Skill/Task].
In my previous role at [Company/Organisation], I was responsible for [Responsibility], which helped me develop [Skill].
I have attached my [CV/Resume] and would like to highlight my experience in [Key Strength], particularly [Example].
One achievement I am particularly proud of is [Achievement], as it demonstrates my ability to [Competency].
I am confident that my strengths in [Skill 1] and [Skill 2] would allow me to contribute effectively to [Team/Project].

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: Request next steps politely and close formally.
expressions: I would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss my application further in an interview.
Please let me know if you require any additional information or supporting documents.
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

requesting_information.title: Requesting Information
requesting_information.purpose: Ask for information politely, clearly, and in an organised way.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Introduce the reason for contact and give context.
expressions: Dear Sir or Madam,
I am writing to enquire about [Course/Service/Product] advertised on [Website/Brochure].
I would be grateful if you could provide further information regarding [Topic].
I am contacting you in connection with [Event/Programme] taking place on [Date].

sections.title: Specific Questions
sections.purpose: Ask focused questions and show polite interest.
expressions: Could you please clarify whether [Feature/Option] is included in the price?
I would also like to know if there are any requirements for [Eligibility/Experience].
In addition, could you confirm the deadline for [Application/Registration]?
I would appreciate details concerning [Costs/Timetable/Accommodation], including [Specific Detail].
Finally, could you advise me on the best way to [Book/Apply/Reserve]?

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: Thank them and close appropriately.
expressions: Thank you in advance for your assistance.
I look forward to receiving your response at your earliest convenience.
If possible, I would appreciate a reply by [Date].
Yours faithfully,
[Full Name]

complaint.title: Making a Complaint
complaint.purpose: Complain politely but firmly, explain the problem, and request a solution.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: State you are complaining and reference the purchase/service clearly.
expressions: Dear Customer Service Team,
I am writing to complain about [Product/Service] which I purchased on [Date] from [Branch/Website].
I am contacting you regarding an issue with [Order Number/Booking Reference].
Unfortunately, I am dissatisfied with the service I received on [Date] at [Location].

sections.title: Problem & Impact
sections.purpose: Explain what went wrong, the impact, and any evidence.
expressions: The main issue is that [Problem], which is unacceptable given [Expectation/Policy].
As a result of this, I have been inconvenienced because [Impact].
To make matters worse, [Additional Problem], despite [Previous Contact/Attempt].
I enclose/attach [Receipt/Photos/Screenshots] as evidence of the problem.
I would like you to investigate this matter and explain why [Issue] occurred.

sections.title: Requested Solution
sections.purpose: Request an outcome and close firmly but politely.
expressions: I would appreciate a full refund / replacement / compensation of [Amount], in accordance with your policy.
I would be grateful if you could resolve this matter within [Timeframe].
If I do not receive a satisfactory response, I will be forced to take further action.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

comparison_recommendation.title: Comparing & Recommending
comparison_recommendation.purpose: Compare options formally and recommend one with justification.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Explain the context and mention what you are comparing.
expressions: Dear [Name/Title],
I am writing in response to your request to compare [Option A] and [Option B].
As requested, I have considered the advantages and disadvantages of [Option A] and [Option B].
Thank you for asking for my opinion regarding [Choice/Decision].

sections.title: Comparison & Reasons
sections.purpose: Compare key features logically and recommend one option.
expressions: In terms of [Criterion], [Option A] appears to be more suitable because [Reason].
However, [Option B] has the advantage of [Benefit], which may be important if [Condition].
Although [Option A] is [Positive], it may be less effective when it comes to [Weakness].
Overall, I would recommend [Option] as it offers the best balance of [Two Criteria].
Taking cost and convenience into account, [Option] seems the most practical choice.

sections.title: Final Recommendation
sections.purpose: Confirm recommendation and offer further help.
expressions: On balance, I believe [Option] would be the most appropriate choice for [Purpose].
Please let me know if you would like me to provide further details about [Option].
I hope these comments are helpful and I would be happy to discuss this further.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

explaining_justifying.title: Explaining & Justifying
explaining_justifying.purpose: Explain a situation formally, justify actions, and propose solutions.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: State why you are writing and reference the situation.
expressions: Dear [Name/Title],
I am writing to explain the circumstances regarding [Situation/Issue] on [Date].
I would like to clarify what happened in relation to [Event/Decision].
I am contacting you to provide an explanation for [Problem].

sections.title: Explanation & Justification
sections.purpose: Explain clearly, take responsibility where appropriate, and justify decisions.
expressions: The reason for this was [Reason], which unfortunately resulted in [Consequence].
Although I understand that [Expectation], it was not possible to [Action] due to [Constraint].
I would like to emphasise that I took every reasonable step to [Action], including [Example].
I acknowledge that [Issue] caused inconvenience, and I apologise for any difficulties this may have caused.
To prevent this from happening again, I propose [Solution/Change].

sections.title: Solution & Closing
sections.purpose: Offer next steps and close professionally.
expressions: I hope this explanation clarifies the situation.
Please let me know if you require any further information.
Thank you for your understanding and I look forward to your response.
Yours sincerely,
[Full Name]

reacting_to_news.title: Reacting to News
reacting_to_news.purpose: Respond to news from a friend with emotion, questions, and friendly tone.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Greet warmly and react to the news immediately.
expressions: Hi [Name]!
I just read your message and I can't believe it!
Wow ‚Äî that's amazing news about [News]!
I'm so sorry to hear about [Problem]‚Ä¶ are you okay?

sections.title: Feelings & Questions
sections.purpose: Show emotion, ask questions, and keep the conversation going.
expressions: I'm honestly so [excited/proud/happy] for you ‚Äî you really deserve it.
How did it happen? Tell me everything about [Details]!
If you feel like talking, I'm here ‚Äî we can chat about [Situation] whenever you want.
What are you going to do next about [Plan/Decision]?
Either way, I'm sending you a huge hug from [Place].

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: End warmly and suggest continuing contact.
expressions: Write back soon!
Let's catch up this weekend if you're free.
Take care and message me anytime.
Best,
[Your Name]

apology.title: Apologising
apology.purpose: Apologise sincerely, explain briefly, and make it right.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Apologise right away and name the problem.
expressions: Hi [Name],
I'm really sorry about [What Happened].
I just wanted to say sorry for [Mistake].
I feel terrible for [Situation], and I hope you can forgive me.

sections.title: Explanation & Fix
sections.purpose: Explain briefly (no excuses), take responsibility, offer a solution.
expressions: There's no excuse ‚Äî I should have [Action].
The truth is, [Reason], but I know I handled it badly.
I completely understand why you're upset about [Impact].
Can I make it up to you by [Solution]?
Next time, I promise I'll [Change].

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: End kindly and keep the relationship positive.
expressions: Thanks for reading this ‚Äî it means a lot.
I hope we can move on from this.
Talk soon?
Take care,
[Your Name]

invitation.title: Inviting Someone
invitation.purpose: Invite a friend, give details, and suggest alternatives.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Greet and introduce the invitation.
expressions: Hey [Name]!
How's everything going?
I was thinking of you because [Reason].
Are you doing anything on [Day/Date]?

sections.title: Invite & Details
sections.purpose: Give the invitation clearly and add practical details.
expressions: I'm having [Event] at [Place] and I'd love you to come.
It starts around [Time], but you can arrive whenever you want.
We could also go to [Alternative Place] if you'd prefer something different.
Bring [Item] if you like, but don't worry if you can't.
Let me know what works best for you ‚Äî we can plan it together.

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: End positively and ask for a reply.
expressions: Hope you can make it!
Text me when you know.
Can't wait to see you!
Cheers,
[Your Name]

giving_advice.title: Giving Advice
giving_advice.purpose: Respond supportively, give suggestions, and encourage your friend.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Show empathy and introduce your advice gently.
expressions: Hi [Name],
Thanks for telling me about [Problem] ‚Äî that sounds stressful.
I'm really glad you reached out.
I've been thinking about what you said about [Situation].

sections.title: Advice & Options
sections.purpose: Give practical advice, offer alternatives, and encourage.
expressions: If I were you, I'd start by [Step 1].
It might be a good idea to [Suggestion], especially because [Reason].
Another option could be [Alternative], if you don't feel ready for [Action].
Try not to worry too much about [Fear] ‚Äî you're stronger than you think.
Whatever you decide, I'm sure you'll do the right thing.

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: End positively and offer ongoing support.
expressions: Let me know how it goes.
I'm here anytime you need to talk.
Good luck ‚Äî you've got this!
All the best,
[Your Name]

arranging_plans.title: Arranging & Planning
arranging_plans.purpose: Make plans, discuss preferences, and agree on details.

sections.title: Opening
sections.purpose: Start the conversation and suggest meeting.
expressions: Hi [Name]!
Are you free this [Weekend/Evening]?
I'd love to catch up ‚Äî it's been ages.
Do you fancy doing something on [Day]?

sections.title: Options & Preferences
sections.purpose: Suggest options, negotiate preferences, and confirm practical details.
expressions: We could meet at [Place] around [Time] if that suits you.
Would you rather do [Option A] or [Option B]?
If the weather's bad, we can always switch to [Backup Plan].
I'm fine with anything, but I'd prefer [Preference] if possible.
Let's decide by [Day/Time] so we can book [Tickets/Table].

sections.title: Closing
sections.purpose: Confirm the plan and end warmly.
expressions: Perfect ‚Äî message me when you know!
Can't wait!
See you soon!
Bye for now,
[Your Name]
